title: How many losses before you go down a Division
body: Just wondering since i just got to Silver 5 and I lost a game that took me to 0 lp, i then lost 6 more games in a row (due to a**holes) while I was on 0 lp and never went down a division. So how does the system know when to drop you down a division / how does it work

replies.body:
Your MMR has to drop to the 5th division on the tier below you.

So if you are Silver V your MMR has to be Bronze V to drop down. So basically, A LOT of losses. I'd guess roughly 20 or so.

I personally had lost something like 12 in a row on 0 LP towards the end of last season and didn't drop down a tier.

>I'd guess roughly 20 or so

It's a lot more than 20, unless you're duoing with someone in bronze 5 and losing them all with that person.

You'll know when you're at risk of demotion when you start vsing Bronze 4/5 players
Yeah pretty much impossible to go from silver V to Bronze I
